resources.string: IT DOG STORY
name
IT DOG STORY MAIN IMAGE
START
Enter your name
%1$s just graduated from IT DOG University with a degree in computer science. Do you want to apply frontend developer?
Yes, i should apply frontend developer.
No, i should take a rest first.
You choose to take a rest and go play PS4. Do you think you should look for a job now, %1$s ?
Yes, i will go to find a job now.
No, i want to play PS4 now!
After few years, you still do not have any job and you became very poor. You start to regard you waste so much time on video game.
You are going to have an job interview tomorrow. What are you going to do now?
Go UDEMY to study more before the interview.
Skip study and go to the interview directly
After self-study in udemy online course, you got more and more knowledge now. What are you going to do now?
Study Again
I am ready to have an interview now!
(In the interview) %1$s , What is REACT
REACT is a PC GAME
REACT is a PS4 GAME in 2018
%1$s ,You did not prepare enough for the interview. You FAIL !
(In the interview) %1$s , What are the advantages of using React?
It is easy to know how a component is rendered, you just need to look at the render function.
React is good for 3D render in PC Game Development.
%1$s , What are the differences between a class component and functional component?
Class components allows you to use additional features such as local state and lifecycle hooks. Also, to enable your component to have direct access to your store and thus holds state.
Class component is using for Video Component. Functional component is using for debug purpose.
%1$s ,You got the offer! Welcome to join our company as a Frontend Developer! (To Be Continued ...)
Story page image
PLAY AGAIN
